thread.title: Karthik Jayaram takes a dig at Sudeep's show
thread.title_full: Karthik Jayaram takes a dig at Sudeep's show - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Karthik Jayaram takes a dig at Sudeep's show
text:
Popular actor Karthik Jayaram has become a big star thanks to his television show Ashwini Nakshatra. The actor recently signed his first national television show Siya Ke Raam, where he will be playing Raavan. This has probably been one of the biggest steps in his career, for this prime-time show on Star Plus is already being spoken about in the showbiz circles nationally.
Though, at the same time, JK, as Karthik is popularly known, seems to have taken a dig at Bigg Boss Kannada, a show hosted by his close friend Sudeep. In what seems like a statement where he regards his national project bigger than his local ones, he wrote on his Facebook wall, "Iam not going and i will never go to BIGG BOSS guys it's a rumour! Iam doing a prestigious serial called "Siya ka Raam" on Star plus!
